tagline: Where public nudity meets drunken absurdity
rules:
Virtual Vixens˸ The Bare-Minimum ＂Rules＂

Alright‚ listen up‚ you beautiful freaksǃ We're all about public nudity and drunken absurdity․ We're a free and open group‚ but even we need a few loose reins to keep the chaos fun and not a total dumpster fire․ So here's the deal˸

Don't be a total dipshit․ Seriously‚ don't ruin the vibe․

Consent is king․ If someone's not into it‚ back off․ Simple as that․

Keep it absurd‚ not aggressive․ We want laughs‚ not drama․

Don't snitch for petty stuff․ We're not tattletales‚ unless it's genuinely bad․

Have fun‚ you idiotǃ That's why we're here․

Got it? Good․ Now go get weird․
infoBoard:
Alright‚ listen up‚ you degeneratesǃ You've stumbled upon the Virtual Vixens‚ and let me tell ya‚ we're not here for your grandma's tea party․ If you're looking for a group that embraces the glorious chaos of public nudity and drunken absurdity‚ you've found your new digital home․

Think of us as the love child of a drinking group and a lewd group‚ but with absolutely no filter․ We're free‚ we're open‚ and we're probably already three shots deep․ So if you're ready to shed your inhibitions （and maybe your clothes） and dive headfirst into some virtual debauchery‚ come on in․ Just don't say I didn't warn you․ This ain't for the faint of heart‚ but it's gonna be one hell of a ride․

categories.x:
If you have ever ERP'ed in the last 24 hours, you may ~g ~m and confess the details; otherwise, you must ~d ~m to avoid the question ~cRaina Rosedrop~
You may remove one article of clothing to ~g ~m, or ~d ~m twice ~cRaina Rosedrop~
You may choose one other player to strip off a piece of virtual clothing and then ~a ~m together ~cRaina Rosedrop~
All players ~d ~m for every Lovense they own (Capped at 10 toys). ~cRaina Rosedrop~
On a scale of 1 to 10 (10 being blacked out), how drunk do you think {player} is right now? They must ~d ~m multiplied by the number you chose. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
You must ~d ~m for each person you have ERP'ed with in the room. You may also ~g ~m per if you reveal who they are. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
Everyone who is currently sitting down must ~d ~m. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
{player} gets to ask YOU one embarrassing question. If you answer, ~g ~m, if you refuse, ~d ~m. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
Everyone wearing an NSFW avatar must ~d ~m. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
You must choose one other player to immediately ~d ~m with you. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
Tell a very embarrassing secret and ~g ~m. ~d ~m if you cant. ~cRunicRavenCroft~
If you speak another language, you must exclusively speak it until your next turn or ~d ~m. ~d twice that if you’re monolingual. ~cOrganic Kale~
~d ~m for every 100 friends you have on VRChat. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
~d ~m if you are friends with {player}. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
If you havent joined Virtual Vixen's Discord, ~d ~m. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
If you are wearing a Pishock, shock yourself for ~m seconds, if not ~d ~m. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
Girls ~d ~m. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
Guys ~d ~m. ~cRaina Rosedrop~
